alert.note: Alert for Blanco; Gillespie; Llano (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 02 at 5:28AM CST until March 02 at 5:45AM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 AM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN BLANCO...EASTERN GILLESPIE AND SOUTHEASTERN LLANO COUNTIES... At 528 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fredericksburg, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Fredericksburg, Kingsland, Round Mountain, Horseshoe Bay, Johnson City, Stonewall, Blowout, Cain City, Sandy, Willow City, Rocky Hill, LBJ State Park, Rocky Creek, Hye, Blumenthal, Eckert, Crabapple, Sunrise Beach Village and LBJ National Historical Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
